title: Who was the last signer of the Declaration of Independence to die? - Quora
tags: Declaration of Independence of the United States
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Charles Carroll of Carrollton from the state of Maryland. He lived a long life: September 19, 1737 – November 14, 1832. He lived to be one of the founders of the Baltimore and Ohio Railroad (1828).
